alert.note: Alert for Hall (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 12:01AM CDT until June 15 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN ADAMS...NORTHEASTERN KEARNEY...SOUTHEASTERN BUFFALO AND SOUTHERN HALL COUNTIES... At 1200 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Prosser, or 10 miles west of Hastings, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Hastings, Doniphan and Hansen around 1215 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 290 and 317. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
